Text:
Dear Kanker76,

First of all, I really appreciate you putting these out for everyone.  My son is 7 years old and he loves this kind of stuff.  Specially Richard Rich productions...

Is there a way that I can download this from you some other way.   The speed is so slow on Pirate Bay. This means a lot to me, please let me know.  thank you so much.
Thank you so much for this! Godspeed & Yahwe BLess...

Thank you for this great content. Real treasures. Unfortunately, one episode is missing from the New Testament: Signs of the Times (2005).
Would you be able to upload this please?
